Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 7th overall pick, by Kansas City in 1966...
Injured on 8/14/1966 with a Bruised Heel, out for 5 days...
Traded from Kansas City to New York (A) on 6/24/1967 (Going to KCA: 2B G. Nettles. Going to NYY: 1B J. Mayberry Sr., 1B R. Skidmore)...
Had first career hit on 6/25/1968, off Mike Cuellar (DET)...
Hit first career homerun on 7/13/1968, off Gary Dotter (MIN)...
Drove in 6 runs against Baltimore on 10/3/1971...
